description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying detailed information about a single note, including functionality for editing and deleting the note. It interacts with a notes service, navigates to an edit screen, and handles user confirmation dialogs for deletions.

classes.name: NoteDetailScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays details for a specific note identified by noteId, with options to edit or delete the note.

classes.name: _NoteDetailScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the UI and logic for NoteDetailScreen, including loading note data, editing, and deleting.

methods.name: _loadNote
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the note data from the service and updates the widget state.

methods.name: _onEdit
methods.description: Navigates to the note editing screen and reloads the note upon return if changed.

methods.name: _onDelete
methods.description: Confirms deletion, calls the delete method from the service, and pops the screen.
